comments.author: Abdulzuruku01
comments.body: Quote from: Oremgee on November 30, 2023, 03:36:27 PMI've come to notice that in this local board  the always talk about the off-topic things making us the newcomers to be confused I don't really know what to post about please sometimes make owner and a try the post something where I'm with the bitcoin talk with the Bitcoin forum some people the post about people begging money the post about bad friends nobody post about Bitcoin abeg make owner the trial the post on topic things so that we the newcomers will get more knowledge because me Abby newcomer if anything we are talk yeah wei inghed day  wrong you guys should tell me don't insult me pleaseIf I understand you correctly, you want to learn about bitcoin but you discovered that the majority of the discussions on our local board don't have anything to do with it. The topics you view as off-topic are actually not off-topic because, if you look closely, the forum has separate boards for politics, gambling, economics, and mining, etc. Our local board does not have anything similar, that is why different topics appear here every day. This board serves as a subboard of the main board, anything that occurs on the main board can also occur here. The local board's goal is to bring individuals from the same nation together through the use of their native tongue because not everyone understands English, which is why local boards allow people to communicate in their native tongue. There isn't a single Nigerian who doesn't understand pidgin, as it is our native tongue on this board.If you are familiar with forums as I do, you will notice that there are numerous local boards, such as those for Arabia, Russia, India, and other countries, and that when you visit those boards, people are communicating in their native tongue. Therefore, as a fellow novice, I will advise you to visit bitcoin discussion, beginners and help, gambling, and other sections if you're really ready to learn about bitcoin. You will even receive materials there that you can use to quickly learn about bitcoin.You can read and ask reasonable questions there.
